thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother winner Coleen Nolan wants to save marriage… despite husband Ray failing to show up at final
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother winner Coleen Nolan wants to save marriage… despite husband Ray failing to show up at final

author: jrobinson
title: Celebrity Big Brother winner Coleen Nolan wants to save marriage… despite husband Ray failing to show up at final
text:
6 Coleen Nolan has revealed her hopes in saving her marriage to husband Ray 
After having a bit of time to let the news sink in, Coleen told Bit on the Side host Rylan Clark-Neal she had realised how much she still loved her husband despite their marital woes before she entered the house. 
She said: “It’s made me realise how much I do need him in my life.” 
As the audience cheered, and Rylan gave her a kiss on the cheek, the 51-year-old elaborated on her feelings. News Group Newspapers Ltd 6 Coleen had revealed she was having problems in her marriage before entering the CBB house 
She continued: “Because when things did happen in the house that were hard and were sad, all my housemates were brilliant, but I just thought if he was here he would know exactly how I was feeling.” 
But in the next breath, Coleen admitted her husband of almost 10 years had not been in the crowd to see her win. Getty Images - WireImage However Coleen admitted her husband hadn’t been there to see her win Coleen Nolan reveals she wants to save her marriage on CBB's Bit on the Side 
She joked: "But he’s in America so he might not come home!" 
Before entering the house, Coleen revealed she was treating her stint on the show as a "trial separation " after confessing the couple were having some problems in their marriage. RELATED STORIES Katie Price leads congratulations to CBB winner Coleen Nolan as Loose Women star romps home TRAGIC NEWS Jedward discover their 'dad is fighting for his life in hospital' moments after pair leave Big Brother in second place DOUBLE TROUBLE Jedward finish as runners up to Coleen Nolan in Celebrity Big Brother final 2017 'She's a cheeky little madam' Kim Woodburn hits out at nemesis Nicola McLean as she finishes third in CBB final 2017 
She got personal during a candid chat with James Jordan in the kitchen, telling him: "I do think I’m having a midlife crisis, I don’t think it’s all him. channel 5 Coleen spoke about their marriage woes on Loose Women in December Coleen Nolan wins Celebrity Big Brother 2017 beating Jedward 
"I’m questioning everything - am I happy? I’m not putting all the blame on him. It’s just really sad.”
